pullRequest.title: [KOGITO-4073] Remove Files.write from generators
pullRequest.bodyText:
https://issues.redhat.com/browse/KOGITO-4073
Details:

Removed the whole metadata package (ImageMetaData, Labeler, etc) because it uses Files.write and image_metadata.json is no more used by the operator (remaining dead code removed with kiegroup/kogito-images#291)
Added Json Schema relative path (JsonSchemaUtil.getJsonDir()) to JSON_SCHEMA GeneratedFiles to make them equivalent to the other GeneratedFiles and reuse the existing write method instead of a custom one
Removed kogito-application.proto generation because no more as file (only used as string inside infinispanBasedPersistence method)
Now infinispanBasedPersistence,  fileSystemBasedPersistence, mongodbBasedPersistence and generatePersistenceProviderClazz all returns generatedFiles
Removed some file().exists() checks inside infinispanBasedPersistence because now files are only stored after the whole generation
Created validateGeneratedFileTypes to assure that no files are lost. This highlighted some problems: now proto's list.json is properly produced also using kogito-maven-plugin (Spring) and now in Quarkus *.proto files are only stored once inside META-INF/resources/persistence/protobuf/ (and not also inside classes/persistance/)
Now all *Mojo use the same writeGeneratedFile method

PR list:

#953
kiegroup/kogito-examples#494

To be merged after #943 Merged

commit.message: [KOGITO-3974] PredictionModels and DecisionModels are now using templates + Created AbstractPredictionModels and AbstractDecisionModels with common code
[KOGITO-3975] WIP, compile but integration broken tests
[KOGITO-3974] Revert ApplicationContainerGenerator changes and postpone ApplicationTemplate to a different PR
[KOGITO-3974] Reviewed DecisionModels/PredictionModels templates to move all the code to abstract
[KOGITO-3972] Updated TemplatedGenerator to use KogitoBuildContext + Now TemplatedGenerator is only used as delegator + Created AbstractConfigGenerator to simplify ConfigGenerator logic
Moved packageName, annotator and addonsConfig to AbstractGenerator + Renamed ApplicationGenerator.withGenerator as ApplicationGenerator.registerAndInitGenerator

Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into decisionmodels-predictionmodels-inject

# Conflicts:
#	kogito-codegen/src/main/java/org/kie/kogito/codegen/prediction/PredictionCodegen.java
#	kogito-codegen/src/main/java/org/kie/kogito/codegen/rules/IncrementalRuleCodegen.java

Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into decisionmodels-predictionmodels-inject

# Conflicts:
#	kogito-maven-plugin/src/main/java/org/kie/kogito/maven/plugin/GenerateModelMojo.java
#	kogito-quarkus-extension/deployment/src/main/java/org/kie/kogito/quarkus/deployment/KogitoAssetsProcessor.java
Postponing moduleGenerator initialization when used (compilationUnit() module) + ApplicationSection.classDeclaration renamed compilationUnit to return the whole template
Fix AbstractConfigGenerator to handle missing templates

Created JavaKogitoBuildContext for non-DI context + Moved DependencyInjectionAnnotator reference inside KogitoBuildContext to prevent inconsistent configuration + Removed all withDependencyInjectionAnnotator (no more needed) + Created a common hasDI() method inside KogitoBuildContext and removed all custom useInjection methods
Introduced static AtomicReference in AbstractPredictionModels to make DMN+PMML integration works even if DecisionModels is loaded first + Fix native-image check

Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into application-config-refactoring

# Conflicts:
#	api/kogito-api/src/main/java/org/kie/kogito/StaticApplication.java
#	drools/kogito-dmn/src/main/java/org/kie/kogito/dmn/AbstractDecisionModels.java
#	drools/kogito-pmml/src/main/java/org/kie/kogito/pmml/AbstractPredictionModels.java
#	integration-tests/integration-tests-quarkus-decisions/src/main/java/org/kie/kogito/integrationtests/InjectDecisionModels.java
#	integration-tests/integration-tests-quarkus-predictions/src/main/java/org/kie/kogito/integrationtests/InjectPredictionModels.java
#	integration-tests/integration-tests-quarkus-processes/src/main/java/org/kie/kogito/integrationtests/InjectProcesses.java
#	integration-tests/integration-tests-springboot/src/it/integration-tests-springboot-it/src/main/java/org/kie/kogito/integrationtests/SpringInjectDecisionModels.java
#	integration-tests/integration-tests-springboot/src/it/integration-tests-springboot-it/src/main/java/org/kie/kogito/integrationtests/SpringInjectPredictionModels.java
#	integration-tests/integration-tests-springboot/src/it/integration-tests-springboot-it/src/main/java/org/kie/kogito/integrationtests/SpringInjectProcesses.java
#	integration-tests/integration-tests-springboot/src/it/integration-tests-springboot-it/src/main/java/org/kie/kogito/integrationtests/SpringInjectRuleUnits.java
#	kogito-codegen/src/main/java/org/kie/kogito/codegen/ApplicationContainerGenerator.java
#	kogito-codegen/src/main/resources/class-templates/CdiDecisionContainerTemplate.java
#	kogito-codegen/src/main/resources/class-templates/DecisionContainerTemplate.java
#	kogito-codegen/src/main/resources/class-templates/spring/SpringDecisionContainerTemplate.java
#	kogito-codegen/src/test/java/org/kie/kogito/codegen/ApplicationGeneratorTest.java

GeneratorContext removed + Moved global values to KogitoBuildContext + Created KogitoBuildContext.Builder to guide the creation + Created AddonsConfig.AddonsConfigBuilder to have immutable AddonsConfig instances

Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into templategenerator-kogitobuildcontext

# Conflicts:
#	kogito-codegen/src/main/java/org/kie/kogito/codegen/ApplicationContainerGenerator.java
#	kogito-codegen/src/test/java/org/kie/kogito/codegen/ApplicationGeneratorTest.java
Removing ImageMetadata because no more used + Moved all file write outside generators
Removed kogito-application.proto because no more used

nodes.bodyText:
Now that we are refactoring, one thing I lacked when using GeneratedFile was a constructor that accepts directly a Path object rather than a String, this will allwo to directly pass here JsonSchemaUtil.getJsonDir().resolve(JsonSchemaUtil.getFilaName(name)).
And, in general, will feel more "modern", wdyt?
is it intended we are losing the temp dir?
I dislike "utils" because they tend to become a dump. if this is intended for validation-related methods, we can call it "GeneratedFileValidation"

commit.message: Renamed GeneratedFileUtils as GeneratedFileValidation + Fix code smells + Fix KogitoAssetsProcessor

nodes.bodyText: Just a note that now in the GenerateModelMojo it is not able to change the sources directory location, before it was possible. Maybe it was not desired even before.
